alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Butts; Jasper; Jones; Monroe; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 11:46AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Baldwin, Putnam, northeastern Monroe, southeastern Butts, northern Jones and Jasper Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1146 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over McElheneys Crossroads, or near Monticello, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, pea sized hail, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Eatonton, Jackson, Monticello, Flovilla, Meriwether, Ethridge, Berner, Resseaus Crossroads, Warfield, Willard, Plant Harlee Branch, Blount, Hillsboro, McElheneys Crossroads, Stanfordville, Indian Springs State Park, Adgateville, Blountsville and Round Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Butts; Jasper; Jones; Monroe; Putnam
